data.title: Shasta College
data.meta_description: Shasta offers a variety of degrees and certificates at campuses across  Shasta-Tehama-Trinity district in Northern California. Sign up for classes now.
data.text:
Discover Your Path

Take an assessment to see how your passions and interests can translate into a career path.

Find Your Program

Explore more than 100 degrees and certificates across a range of in-demand disciplines.

Student Success Support

To help you reach your goals, we offer a comprehensive range of support services and programs.

Apply Today

First step is to submit your application for admission. Get started with CCCApply—the universal application for California community college system.

Dual Enrollment

Gain access to college level coursework while attending high school. All classes are located on high school campuses throughout the district.

College Connection

Attend Shasta College as a high school senior and earn high school and college credits.

Concurrent Enrollment

​Earn college units while still in high school and get a head start on your college degree.

Gateway to College

An alternative education program that allows you to complete your high school graduation requirements at Shasta.

Counseling

Not sure where to begin? Our mission is to encourage, guide and support students in pursuit of their academic, personal, and career goal.

Apply Today

First step is to submit your application for admission. Get started with CCCApply—the universal application for California community college system.

Accelerated College Education (ACE)

Make full-time progress toward your certificate or degree by taking compressed, 8-week hybrid and online classes that follow a structured schedule.

BOLD

Interested in transferring to a local or online university to complete a bachelor’s degree program? Learn more about resources to help you be successful!!

Transfer Center

Planning to transfer to a CSU, UC, out-of-state or private school? Shasta College has the services and resources to help you take your next step.

Student Success Support

To help you reach your goals, we offer a comprehensive range of support services and programs.
